resources.string: o sona e nimi pi ma musi
nanpa insa kepeken kule walo li %s
nanpa insa kepeken kule pimeja li %s

string.name: knowingTheChessBoard
string.comment:
knowingTheChessBoard
Part of the coordinates intro.
This string did not use to have "for several reasons:" in it, so please add this text if it is missing (also, see in context).

resources.string: sina sona e nimi pi ma lili pi supa musi la, ni li suli mute tan ni:
lipu sona pi musi pi lawa mije moli li kepeken mute e \"nasin toki pi sona nanpa\".
sina sona e \"toki pi musi pi lawa mije moli\" la, sina ken toki pona e musi tawa jan pona sina.
sina sona e nimi ma la, sina ken lukin sona e musi kepeken wawa suli.
ma ni la o pana e nimi ma
